topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5448b0976368724161620000#post_5448b0976368724161620000
All I've really got down is the names. (I'll change them if I can think of better)

[spoiler]Kamen rider EV
Kamen Rider Booster
Kamen Rider Shower
Kamen Rider Thunder
Kamen Rider Umber
Kamen Rider Esper
Kamen Rider Glay
Kamen Rider Leaf
Kamen Rider Sylph[/spoiler]

And Also that the first 4 are 100% Heroic, While the other 5 are more Ambiguous.

What I need most right now is to come up with more detail for the riders, A plot that gives room for cool MOTW to fight, And Some Toyetic-sounding Henshin devices and weapons.

I have a better idea, Plates. (Basically, There are a bunch of ancient metal sheets embedded with some sort of mystical power. And some organization researches them and makes belts that allows the wearers to become riders when certain plates are inserted into them In order to Combat...Something. Other Minor plates can be used to summon weapons and perform finishers, Like the rider kick.)

...I'm coming up with this on the spot, What are you expecting?

I know, That sounds very stupid.

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5448c04d63687212a2dd0100#post_5448c04d63687212a2dd0100
You've lost control.

My roommate is smoking pot outside like a degenerate.
Meanwhile I am enjoying absinthe.
Kind of a lot of work.

My roommate is leaving soon so my mood is elated because I dislike the presence of other life forms near me. Except for my pets.
Which includes the girl I'm seeing but she's away for the week

I sometimes have bouts of hallucinations, both auditory and visual.
Once I had tactile. It triggered an ASMR.

Any more details of my life I should unwittingly share?
Hm Squiggy? Is that what you want with your sustained mental attack upon me?!
